title: India's credit card losses spike for millennialsâ€™ swipe-spend-default habit
description: Credit card defaults among young millennials have increased, driven by BNPL schemes and e-commerce purchases on EMIs. Credit card outstanding dues have risen significantly, with net credit losses reported at 5-6%. The RBI's measures to curb unsecured loans are showing results, slowing down credit growth in these segments.
